short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show a popup or highlight if the company or brand is still in Russia.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Here is how it works:
You download our extension and pick the cause you want to support.
We give you alerts when a company is behaving unethically and give you a better alternative.
After you switch, we record how much you spent with the competition and inform the unethical company how much money they are losing across all our users.

You make your decision once and donâ€™t worry about it afterwards. We will do your research, update our database and give our users a voice towards companies. Ethical boycotts were never this easy.
